mapper.select: SELECT funding_idx, funding_title, funding_thumbnail, funding_target_price, funding_current_price, funding_start_date, funding_end_date, funding_permit_state, funding_current_state, funding_category, funding_views FROM funding AS ft RIGHT JOIN myorder AS mot ON mot.member_idx = ft.member_idx AND mot.member_idx = #{member_idx} ORDER BY mot.order_date DESC LIMIT 3
